sentences.sContent: Every council member voted against the proposal.
sentences.sCn: 每位市政会委员都对该提案投了反对票。

sentences.sContent: those who are campaigning against the new road
sentences.sCn: 鼓动反对修筑新公路的人

sentences.sContent: Mr Howard has declared that he is against all forms of racism.
sentences.sCn: 霍华德先生表明反对任何形式的种族主义。

phrases.pCn: 在…对面；正对着；与…相反；与…形成对照

remMethod.val: again(又， 再) + st → 再一次反对 → 反(对)

trans.tranOther: used to say that someone opposes or disagrees with something
